This is a great upload, thanks a lot! It may be in Russian, but if you search for 'rus' in the the episode 2 folder and delete everything, it'll turn the menu into english. Also, open the rev.ini file and change Russian into English and the subtitles will be available. The voices are still in Russian, but if you're too lazy to read some text go buy the game.
